articles.description: Watch live coverage, listen to radio commentary and follow text updates from day four of Wimbledon featuring Andy and Jamie Murray, plus Katie Boulter, Harriet Dart, Jack Draper and Cameron Norrie.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 LIVE: Day four - watch Andy Murray, Jack Draper and Katie Boulter - tennis scores, results & order of play

articles.description: Euro 2024 latest with latest England news plus build-up and news conferences before Friday's quarter-finals at involving Spain v Germany and Portugal v France.
articles.title: Euro 2024 latest: England updates and build-up to quarter-finals

articles.description: Erik ten Hag says there is "lots of hard work ahead" after signing new Manchester United contract.
articles.title: Erik ten Hag signs new Manchester United deal until 2026

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton makes his predictions for the last-eight matches, starting with Spain against Germany on Friday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Chris Sutton's quarter-final predictions

articles.description: England forward Phil Foden says the team's players "need to take some of the blame"  for poor performances and that he "feels sorry" for under pressure manager Gareth Southgate.
articles.title: Phil Foden says players 'need to take some blame' and he 'feels sorry' for England boss Gareth Southgate

articles.description: In a Tailenders podcast special, James Anderson shares some of his favourite moments and regrets before his 21-year international career ending at Lord's against West Indies.
articles.title: James Anderson: England bowler's record-breaking career, in his own words

articles.description: John White did the League and Cup Double and won the Cup Winners Cup winner, but his sudden death left his son searching for the man beneath the comic-book persona
articles.title: Tottenham's John White and his son's search for lost superstar

articles.description: Mark Cavendish earns Tour de France immortality with 35th stage win, eclipsing Eddy Merckx to become its greatest ever stage winner.
articles.title: Mark Cavendish earns Tour de France immortality with 35th stage win

articles.description: Growing up, Kylian Mbappe had Cristiano Ronaldo posters on his wall. On Friday they will meet as France play Portugal at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe vs Cristiano Ronaldo: Real Madrid icons past and future meet as France play Portugal at Euro 2024

articles.description: New Zealand full-back Stephen Perofeta starts against England in the Test series opener on Saturday in Dunedin.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Stephen Perofeta in All Blacks team for first Test
